entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 9:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
